about_the_game:
This DLC contains "Let there be light in Hell" Quest.
Invade Hell & restore the light!
To get the Angel into the party, you'll have to dress him up so that no one can recognize him!
Make items for the Halloween costume!
detailed_description:
This DLC contains "Let there be light in Hell" Quest.
Invade Hell & restore the light!
To get the Angel into the party, you'll have to dress him up so that no one can recognize him!
Make items for the Halloween costume!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Doodle God Blitz: Let there be light DLC

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
